content: u & d v s p own anilla wirl by holly isaac --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- this is my go-to vanilla pattern when using self-striping or highly variegated yarns i have a high instep so really a heel flap and gusset sock fits me best however i don t like to have my stripes disrupted in the instep area nor do i like the large sections of pooling that happen with a variegated yarn in the gusset so i prefer a short row heel for those yarns but i still need a gusset for my high instep hence these socks and the pattern can be worked either toe up or cuff down size adult x-small small med med/large large x-large to fit about 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 inch foot circumference materials ❖ 100g light fingering weight yarn ❖ us size 1 2 25mm needle or size needed to obtain gauge ❖ stitch markers ❖ tapestry needle gauge 9 stitches and 12 row/inch in stockinette notes ❖ when more than one number is given the first applies to the x-small size the second to the small and so on ❖ the size of the sock can be adjusted by adjusting needle size and/or by using a lighter or heavier fingering weight yarn abbreviations k knit p purl m1l make 1 left m1r make 1 right pm/sm place marker/slip marker ksw knit shadow wrap see note at end for instructions psw purl shadow wrap see note at end tksw/tpsw triple knit/purl shadow wrap see note at end k2tog knit 2 together ssk slip slip knit ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 1 instructions cuff down instructions cuff using thegerman twisted cast-on or other stretchycast on cast on 56 60 64 68 72 76 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist stitches work 2x2 or 1x1 rib whichever you prefer for 20 rounds or desired length leg knit 52 rounds or desired length heel with mini wedge gusset round 1 at beginning of round m1r pm knit 28 30 32 34 36 38 this is your instep pm m1l knit to end of round round 2 k1 sm work instep sm k1 knit to end of round round 3 m1r knit to marker sm work instep sm knit to end of instep m1l knit to end of round round 4 knit to marker sm work instep sm knit to end of instep and end of round repeats rounds 3 and 4 until there are 6 - 8 gusset stitches on either side of instep ending with round 4 a non-increase round the number of stitches you choose to add will depend on how high the instep is and how much more room is needed in that area of the instep work across instep then work a shadow wrap short row heel or any other short row heel over 28 30 32 34 36 38 st on heel side
